name.baseName: Vacuum Residuum，Heavy Oil Distillates （Vacuum Gas Oil， Coker Gas Oil，Fluid Catalytic Cracking (FCC) Cycle Oil，Deasphalted Oil）
减压渣油、重油馏分(减压蜡油、焦化蜡油、裂化循环油、脱沥青油等）

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: acuum residuum is a heavy petroleum fraction that remains after the lighter fractions have been distilled off under vacuum conditions. It's typically processed further in cokers or used as feedstock for other refining processes. Heavy oil distillates refer to the fractions obtained from the distillation of crude oil. These can include a variety of specific products, depending on the refining process and the type of crude. Coker gas oil is derived from the coking process, where heavy residues are broken down to produce lighter fractions and coke. This is a product of the fluid catalytic cracking process, where heavy oil fractions are broken down into lighter products in the presence of a catalyst. Deasphalted oil is produced by removing the asphaltic components from vacuum resid or other heavy fractions. This oil is typically of higher quality and can be processed further in refineries.

真空残渣是在真空条件下蒸馏掉轻质馏分后剩下的重质石油馏分。它通常在焦化装置中进一步加工，或用作其他炼油工艺的原料。重油馏分指的是原油蒸馏后得到的馏分。根据炼油工艺和原油类型的不同，重油馏分可包括多种特定产品。焦化气油来自焦化工艺，重质残渣在焦化过程中被分解，产生较轻的馏分和焦炭。这是流体催化裂化工艺的产物，重油馏分在催化剂作用下分解成较轻的产品。脱沥青油是通过去除真空渣油或其他重油馏分中的沥青质成分生产出来的。这种油通常质量较高，可在炼油厂进一步加工。
